sentence: So far, she has backed Starbuck, Collins, Vance, Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker, Illinois Rep. Mary Miller, North Carolina House candidate Bo Hines, and Florida House candidate Anthony Sabatini.

title: Marjorie Taylor Greene backs Robby Starbuck, Ortagus not worthy of Trump support
